description: You can channel touch spells through your familiar without needing to be adjacent to it.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Caster level 5th, ability to acquire a familiar.

sections.text: Once per day, you can cast a touch spell without being in contact with your familiar and designate your familiar as the "toucher." You don't need line of sight to your familiar to use this ability, but you must be within 30 feet of your familiar when you cast the spell, and if you can't see or hear your familiar, you must at least be able to speak with it.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another use of this feat, and the distance you can be from your familiar increases by 10 feet.
sections.name: Special

sections.text: Your familiar must be in contact with you when a spell is cast in order for it to deliver the spell.
sections.name: Normal

name: Unfettered Familiar
